QuestData.Title: Cult of Personality
QuestData.Description: Some of my people are still alive! We must rescue them!$b$bThe prisoners are kept in cages throughout the ridge, waiting for this horrible fate to befall them.$b$bPlease, set them free. We cannot let what happened to Lavrash happen to them!
QuestData.RewardText: So few.... But each one is one more friend we can bring to bear against this madness!
